action.content:

X □ □ □ X
X X X X X

X □ □ □ X
X X X X X
X X □ □ □
X X □ □ □

Instruction: Describe the target grid.
Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target grid. Omit any other text.

Expression: The grid with an X in the top left corner, Xs in the second row from the top spanning the entire row, Xs in the third, fourth, and fifth rows spanning the entire row, and empty cells in the top right, middle, and bottom right corners of the grid.
